description: Shuuichi Kagaya isn’t human. He has an unnatural sense of smell, and can transform into an incredibly powerful beast… of sorts. He does all he can to avoid standing out and being discovered, but no good deed goes unpunished, and his decision to use his power to save a girl spells the end for his quiet life.

tags.name: Aliens
tags.description: Prominently features extraterrestrial lifeforms.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Psychosexual
tags.description: Work that involves the psychological aspects of sexual impulses.

tags.name: Death Game
tags.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Vore
tags.description: Features a character being swallowed or swallowing another creature whole.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Femdom
tags.description: Female Dominance. Features sexual acts with a woman in a dominant position.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B2%B8%E7%94%B0%E9%9A%86%E5%AE%8F)

Takahiro Kishida is an animator and renown character designer.

Kishida's designs are well received by animators and attract talent into shows easily. He is also praised for his shot composition skills and copies of his layouts are widely distributed in the industry as drawing reference. Nowadays he is mostly only credited for character design in the shows he participates in, but in reality he works as an animation director uncredited quite often. He rarely heavily corrects the key animator's cuts, strongly believing that the animators' distinctiveness should be noticeable.

Noted for his designs on shows like [Haikyuu](https://anilist.co/anime/20464/), [Serial Experiments Lain](https://anilist.co/anime/339/), [Madoka Magica](https://anilist.co/anime/9756/), [Baccano](https://anilist.co/anime/2251/) and more.

__[Website](https://ciqii.com/)__ | __[Profile (Hifumi Inc.)](https://hifumi-inc.co.jp/y0c1e/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/y0c1e)__ | __[Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/y0c1e)__

__Ryouhei Sataka__, alternatively known by stage name y0c1e, is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger, sound producer and DJ.

__[Website](http://projectmili.com)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ProjectMili)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/projectmili/)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ProjectMili)__ | __[Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/ProjectMili)__

Indie band “Mili” consists of: Canadian vocalist [Cassie Wei](https://anilist.co/staff/188041/Cassie-Wei), capable of writing lyrics in three languages. Composer and arranger [Yamato Kasai](https://anilist.co/staff/168859), with a proven track record of providing music to various artists, such as Higuchi Ai, DAOKO, and Hanazawa Kana. Bassist [Yukihito Mitomo](https://anilist.co/staff/189705/Yukihito-Mitomo) and drummer [Shoto Yoshida](https://anilist.co/staff/189704/Shoto-Yoshida) are long-time musicians who have gone through both indie and major debuts. Animator, illustrator, and character designer [Ao Fujimori](https://anilist.co/staff/159213/Ao-Fujimori), an experienced animation director, is in charge of Mili's visual artwork.

Mili has written music for popular anime and game titles such as "Ghost in the Shell", "Goblin Slayer", "Limbus Company", "Library of Ruina", "ENDER LILIES", and "Promise of Wizard". They create music in various genres, such as classical, electronic, rock, and jazz, while maintaining a high level of quality. They handle music, visual art, merchandise, management, and business all by themselves. Mili is fully in control of their production and is recognized as a unique presence both domestically and internationally.

They are also producing many songs for anime, game, and IT companies in Japan, Korea, China, Canada, and Poland.

(Source: Spotify, edited)
